docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Women who take over-the-counter multivitamin pills early in pregnancy sharply reduce the risk of having a baby with a type of serious neurological defect, a new study has found.

headline.main: Sharp Cut in Serious Birth Defect Is Tied to Vitamins in Pregnancy

docs.snippet: LEAD: Women who take over-the-counter multivitamin pills early in pregnancy sharply reduce the risk of having a baby with a type of serious neurological defect, a new study has found.
